channel.title: [ALLSTAR]Chaning npc drops and making items weild correctly
channel.description:
Ok, so I'm a new coder, learning c++ from a book, i r iz so pr0o
Anyways I was wondering how do I change the drops and rates on Allstar-scape v2
And I have the ids for void, penace, other items, how do I get them to weild correctly?
Thanks :P

item.title: [ALLSTAR]Chaning npc drops and making items weild correctly
item.dc:creator: @Unknown_Supreme Unknown Supreme
item.description:
@Unknown_Supreme wrote:

The items like void need to be placed in the correct line in the item.java folder.

Read full topic
item.source: [ALLSTAR]Chaning npc drops and making items weild correctly

item.title: [ALLSTAR]Chaning npc drops and making items weild correctly
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

[quote=“baselm, post:3, topic:307229”]Npcdrop.java
then search for the npc id and add the item u want it to drop[/quote]

The very last number, which may be 1-100, is the precent of the time it will drop.

Read full topic
